key_sections: Framework Overview with purpose and target audience
Complete 60-second script structure with timing breakdown
Complete example scripts with full transcriptions
Visual direction and delivery tips throughout

patterns_discovered.description: Both frameworks use detailed 7-beat breakdown with specific timing, script templates, visuals, and delivery tips for each section
patterns_discovered.evidence: Hook → Context → Feature Comparisons → Value Discussion → Verdict → CTA structure

patterns_discovered.description: Each beat includes 3-5 alternative script options (OPTION A, B, C, etc.) allowing flexibility for different products and audiences
patterns_discovered.evidence: Hook section provides 5 different opening approaches

patterns_discovered.description: Frameworks provide both full-length (60-second) and condensed (30-second) versions for content variation
patterns_discovered.evidence: Complete script structure section plus 30-second condensed version table

patterns_discovered.description: Frameworks explain why content works (psychological triggers, TikTok advantages) before teaching how to execute it
patterns_discovered.evidence: 'Why Comparison Content Works' section with psychological triggers and TikTok-specific advantages

patterns_discovered.description: Every script beat includes parallel visual guidance, delivery tips, and pro tips alongside the spoken words
patterns_discovered.evidence: Each beat has Visual, Delivery Tips, and Pro Tip sections

patterns_discovered.description: Templates designed for selling physical products through educational/informative content rather than hard sell
patterns_discovered.evidence: Emphasis on 'educational value,' 'honest comparison,' and positioning as helpful guide

gotchas_discovered.description: The comparison-framework.md file is 59,021 characters but the git diff shows '(truncated, 59021 chars total)' indicating the full file content may not be visible
gotchas_discovered.impact: tutorial-framework.md content not shown in diff - cannot verify its actual structure matches pattern

gotchas_discovered.description: Templates provide psychological theory but no data on actual performance metrics, engagement rates, or conversion numbers
gotchas_discovered.impact: Users have framework but no case studies or benchmarks to optimize against

gotchas_discovered.description: All examples use TCG/trading card binders; templates may need significant customization for completely different product categories
gotchas_discovered.impact: Creator must do substantial work to adapt examples to their specific product

gotchas_discovered.description: Templates focus on content creation but don't address affiliate links, sponsorships, or direct sales integration
gotchas_discovered.impact: Creators unclear on how to actually earn revenue from these videos

recommendations.recommendation: Add case study examples showing real TikTok creators using these frameworks with engagement metrics, viewer count growth, and conversion data
recommendations.rationale: Would provide creators with realistic expectations and proof of effectiveness

recommendations.recommendation: Create a script template generator that accepts product category and auto-populates examples and hooks specific to that category
recommendations.rationale: Reduces friction for creators to customize templates; currently requires significant manual work

recommendations.recommendation: Add supplementary section on integrating affiliate links, sponsorships, and direct sales CTAs without sacrificing educational value
recommendations.rationale: Templates are content-focused but creators need revenue model guidance

recommendations.recommendation: Develop visual storyboard templates showing recommended camera angles, transitions, and B-roll progression for each beat
recommendations.rationale: Would help less experienced video creators understand visual execution alongside script

recommendations.recommendation: Add A/B testing guidance showing which script variations, timing, and hooks perform best on TikTok's algorithm
recommendations.rationale: Currently framework is prescriptive but doesn't acknowledge platform algorithmic considerations

recommendations.recommendation: Verify tutorial-framework.md follows same structure and depth as comparison-framework.md for consistency
recommendations.rationale: Tutorial file was created but content not visible in diff; should confirm parallel quality and completeness
